Articles.Content:
Hi! Sam Kerby here, nice to meet you all. So i have decided i want to start making my own videos of the adventures that i have in KSP. My focus on these episodes will be more about the adventure and not so much about the building and launching phases. I only have one video at the moment, and i will admit i need some practice making videos and narrating. I am hoping to spend a lot more time on episode two and future episodes. So if you are interested in subscribing or commenting here is my first video.

Thank you fellow Kerbals!
Good luck with it. I like your ship designs, but your narration is hardly bearable. You need to speak up, intonate your voice more vibrantly, and talk about the exciting parts, never complain.

Good luck with it. I like your ship designs, but your narration is hardly bearable. You need to speak up, intonate your voice more vibrantly, and talk about the exciting parts, never complain.

Thanks for the criticism. I totally agree I will be focusing on narration a lot more with the next episode. Which I am hopping to have up sometime this weekend.
You gotta be careful in this forum. People are touchy.

You gotta be careful in this forum. People are touchy.

That is a good thing though! Everyone always needs constructive criticism! Good luck on the YouTube channel I am doing the same. Cheers!
Ep. 2 now up hope you enjoy.
